page.title: 13A Day in the life of Chris
page.content: I usually get up at about 7.15a.m.,I get dressed and have breakfast - Rice Krispies,Shredded Wheat,or Frosties, sometimes I also have toast.I watch T.V. until Dad gets up and tells me to go outside,because my two sisters are already out.I usually go and knock for Paul - he sometimes invites me in,but normally we go off on our bikes or play French cricket.Eventually the ball hits a window and we get told to play elsewhere!Then it is time for lunch,I have sausages,chips and beans. After lunch I sometimes go to the beach - if it is high tide I go fishing.At about 6 o'clock I have tea - bread and butter,jam,and home made cakes.Sometimes,after tea I play out. Then I watch T.V. until bedtime at about 8.45p.m..That is an average in the life of me - Christopher Wood of Gorran Haven.
